protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-109879
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana seeds were sterilized in sterile water, kept 4C for 3-d, and sown on 0.3% (w/v) gellun gum plates containing Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium, 0.5 g/L MES, pH 5.8, and 2g/L Suc. Plates were incubated for 14 days in growth chamber at 22C under continuous light (50 mmol photons m-2 s-1).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-109880
protocol.text: Leaves with visible petioles were removed from aerial parts of plants. And collected remaining parts from about 50 plants.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-110298
protocol.text: Hybridization using the GeneChip Hybridization, Wash, and Stain Kit in a GeneChip Hybridization Oven 640 for 16h, at 45?.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-114005
protocol.text: Using GeneSpring GX 7.3,  the values less than 0.01 were set to 0.01, and then data from each chip was normalized to the 50th percentile of values taken from that chip. Then, values of each gene were normalized to that of mean values for Col-0.1 and Col-0.2. After that, spread sheet was made, and comberted it to tab delimited text file.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-16627
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with Trizol reagent (Gibco BRL, Cleveland, OH) and subsequently purified using an RNeasy Mini Kit(Qiagen) according to the manufacturer`s instructions.
